title: Putin Wants to Divide Ukrainians. Mykolaiv Is a Test Case.
description: In a battered city on Ukraine’s southern coast, salt water runs from the taps and electricity is sporadic. Residents curse Russia, but also express frustration with their own leaders.
dc:creator: Andrew E. Kramer and Finbarr O’Reilly
media:credit: Finbarr O'Reilly for The New York Times
